verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Command <S%H6680><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, My offering, <S%H7133><s%> and my bread <S%H3899><s%> for my sacrifices made by fire, for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to me, shall you observe <S%H8104><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> to me in their due season. <S%H4150><s%>

And you shall say <S%H559><s%> to them, This <S%H2088><s%> is the offering made by fire which <S%H834><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> spot <S%H8549><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> by day, <S%H3117><s%> for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering.

The one <S%H259><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shall you offer <S%H6213><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shall you offer <S%H6213><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even; <S%H6153><s%>

And a tenth <S%H6224><s%> part of an ephah <S%H374><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> of beaten <S%H3795><s%> oil. <S%H8081><s%>

It is a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, which was ordained <S%H6213><s%> in mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai <S%H5514><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereof shall be the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> for the one <S%H259><s%> lamb: <S%H3532><s%> in the holy <S%H6944><s%> place shall you cause the strong wine <S%H7941><s%> to be poured <S%H5258><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And the other <S%H8145><s%> lamb <S%H3532><s%> shall you offer <S%H6213><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even: <S%H6153><s%> as the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and as the drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereof, you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> it, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And on <S%H5921><s%> the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> spot, <S%H8549><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> and the drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereof:
This is the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering of every sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And in the beginnings <S%H7218><s%> of your months <S%H2320><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> spot; <S%H8549><s%>

And three <S%H7969><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> bullock; <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals of flour <S%H5560><s%> for a meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> ram; <S%H352><s%>

And a several tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil <S%H8081><s%> for a meat offering <S%H4503><s%> to one <S%H259><s%> lamb; <S%H3532><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell, <S%H7381><s%> a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings shall be half <S%H2677><s%> an hin <S%H1969><s%> of wine <S%H3196><s%> to a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and the third <S%H7992><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> to a ram, <S%H352><s%> and a fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin <S%H1969><s%> to a lamb: <S%H3532><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> is the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering of every month <S%H2320><s%> throughout the months <S%H2320><s%> of the year. <S%H8141><s%>

And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be offered, <S%H6213><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.
And in the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the passover <S%H6453><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast: <S%H2282><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread be eaten. <S%H398><s%>

In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> manner of servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein:

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a sacrifice made by fire for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> and seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year: <S%H8141><s%> they shall be to you without <S%H8549><s%> blemish: <S%H8549><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> shall be of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil: <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals shall you offer <S%H6213><s%> for a bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals for a ram; <S%H352><s%>
A several tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal shall you offer <S%H6213><s%> for every lamb, <S%H3532><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%>
And one <S%H259><s%> goat <S%H8163><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you.

You shall offer <S%H6213><s%> these <S%H428><s%> beside <S%H905><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is for a continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering.

After this <S%H428><s%> manner you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> daily, <S%H3117><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> the meat <S%H3899><s%> of the sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it shall be offered <S%H6213><s%> beside <S%H5921><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, and his drink <S%H5262><s%> offering.

And on <S%H5921><s%> the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work. <S%H4399><s%>

Also in the day <S%H3117><s%> of the first fruits, <S%H1061><s%> when you bring <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> after your weeks <S%H7620><s%> be out, you shall have <S%H1961><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work: <S%H4399><s%>

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> the burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullocks, <S%H6499><s%> one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year; <S%H8141><s%>

And their meat offering <S%H4503><s%> of flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals to one <S%H259><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals to one <S%H259><s%> ram, <S%H352><s%>
A several tenth <S%H6241><s%> deal to one <S%H259><s%> lamb, <S%H3532><s%> throughout the seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs; <S%H3532><s%>
And one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats, <S%H5795><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you.

You shall offer <S%H6213><s%> them beside <S%H905><s%> the continual <S%H8548><s%> burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and his meat offering, (they shall be to you without <S%H8549><s%> blemish) <S%H8549><s%> and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings.
